title: Paradisio II
text: Larsen designers often applied one design on different ground cloths to achieve quite different effects. Paradisio II and Paradisio I both address opacity and transparency concerns as well as set boundariesâ€”Paradisio I to contain water and Paradisio II to limit light.
description: Sheer Etching Print of palm trees. Vert Rpt. 38\" Black background with white. 40\" vert. Rpt. (white on black)
